Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us and has the potential to significantly impact your business. We believe in creating partnerships that not only benefit both parties but also contribute positively to the industry. Considering the exceptional quality and unique features of this product, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you have access to a game-changing solution that aligns with your strategic objectives. We trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing how our product can enhance your operations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We are committed to supporting you every step of the way. Best regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
